Class Checkpoints

java.lang.Object
cycling.Checkpoints
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Checkpoints extends Object implements Serializable
Checkpoints stores the information relevent to a given checkpoint

  • Constructor Details

    • Checkpoints

      public Checkpoints​(int id, int stageId, Double location, CheckpointType type, Double averageGradient, Double length)
      Creates a new checkpoint for Mountain Checkpoints, adding mountain specific attributes
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the checkpoint to be added
      stageId - ID of the stage the checkpoint belongs to
      location - The location of the checkpoint
      type - The type of checkpoint
      averageGradient - The average gradient of the checkpoint
      length - The length of the checkpoint
